languages.text: "Тише! Прошу, прекратите... Хватит терзать мой разум! Я не позволю вам стать очередной Душой-на-ветру даже за свет миллионов звезд, только позвольте мне объясниться..."

traits.locale_text: "Тише! Прошу, прекратите... Хватит терзать мой разум! Я не позволю вам стать очередной Душой-на-ветру даже за свет миллионов звезд, только позвольте мне объясниться..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."
languages.original_text: "Тише! Прошу, прекратите... Хватит терзать мой разум! Я не позволю вам стать очередной Душой-на-ветру даже за свет миллионов звезд, только позвольте мне объясниться..."

traits.locale_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Calla... Para, por favor... ¡No tortures más mi mente! No, no permitiré que te conviertas en otro espíritu al viento, ni por toda la luz de un millón de estrellas; pero deja que me explique...».
languages.original_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: «Calla... Para, por favor... ¡No tortures más mi mente! No, no permitiré que te conviertas en otro espíritu al viento, ni por toda la luz de un millón de estrellas; pero deja que me explique...».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「しゃべるな…やめてくれ…我の心を苦しめるな！百万の星々の光にかけて、あなたを風の精霊になどさせるものか。どうか我の話を聞いてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: 「しゃべるな…やめてくれ…我の心を苦しめるな！百万の星々の光にかけて、あなたを風の精霊になどさせるものか。どうか我の話を聞いてくれ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “安静吧……不要说了……请不要再折磨我的心灵了！我不会让你的灵魂随风消散，不会让你在群星之中黯淡下去，请允许我解释一下吧……”
languages.original_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: “安静吧……不要说了……请不要再折磨我的心灵了！我不会让你的灵魂随风消散，不会让你在群星之中黯淡下去，请允许我解释一下吧……”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Assez... Arrêtez, je vous prie... Arrêtez de torturer mon esprit ! Je ne vous laisserai pas devenir un autre esprit dans le vent, pas pour toutes les étoiles du monde, laissez-moi simplement m'expliquer... »
languages.original_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: « Assez... Arrêtez, je vous prie... Arrêtez de torturer mon esprit ! Je ne vous laisserai pas devenir un autre esprit dans le vent, pas pour toutes les étoiles du monde, laissez-moi simplement m'expliquer... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ruhe ... Bitte hört auf ... Hört auf, meinen Geist zu quälen! Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass Ihr zu einem weiteren Geist im Wind werdet, für kein Licht einer Millionen Sterne, aber lasst es mich erklären ..."
languages.original_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhe ... Bitte hört auf ... Hört auf, meinen Geist zu quälen! Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass Ihr zu einem weiteren Geist im Wind werdet, für kein Licht einer Millionen Sterne, aber lasst es mich erklären ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Sessiz ol... Lütfen dur... Zihnime işkence etmeyi kes! Milyonlarca yıldızın ışığı uğruna bile olsa Rüzgâra Kapılan Ruh olmana izin vermem. Bırak açıklayayım..."
languages.original_text: "Quiet... Please stop... Stop torturing my mind! I will not let you become another Spirit on the Wind, not for the light of a million stars, just let me explain myself..."

traits.locale_text: "Sessiz ol... Lütfen dur... Zihnime işkence etmeyi kes! Milyonlarca yıldızın ışığı uğruna bile olsa Rüzgâra Kapılan Ruhlardan biri olmana izin vermeyeceğim. Bırak açıklayayım..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
